title: Famous People: Music (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Music subcategory within Famous People. Includes 5 card(s).

cards.english: Seiji Ozawa became the music director of the Boston Symphony Orchestra at just 38 years of age.
cards.romaji: Ozawa Seiji wa, wazuka sanj hassai de Bosuton k.ky. gakudan no ongaku kantoku ni sh nin shita.
cards.japanese: 小澤征爾は、わずか三十八歳でボストン交響楽団の音楽監督に就任した。

cards.english: Hibari Misora is the first woman to receive the People's Honour Award.
cards.romaji: Misora Hibari wa, josei hatsu no kokumin eiyosh. jush.sha desu.
cards.japanese: 美空ひばりは、女性初の国民栄誉賞受賞者です。

cards.english: Kyu Sakamoto's best known song is "Ue o Muite Aruk.", or "Walk Looking Upward", which is known as "Sukiyaki" in English.
cards.romaji: Sakamoto Ky no besuto hitto wa, eigo dewa "Sukiyaki" to shite shirareru "ue o muite aruk." toy uta desu.
cards.japanese: 坂本九のベストヒットは、英語では「スキヤキ」として知られる「上を向いて歩こう」という歌です。

cards.english: Enka songs by Kiyoshi Hikawa sound like a mix of enka and pop music.
cards.romaji: Hikawa Kiyoshi no enka wa, enka to poppu no yg. no y.na uta desu.
cards.japanese: 氷川きよしの演歌は、演歌とポップの融合のような歌です。

cards.english: Since their debut in 1999, Arashi has become more and more popular both in Japan and abroad.
cards.romaji: sen ky hyaku ky j ky nen no deby ik., Arashi wa nihon koku naigai de ninki o takamete kimashita.
cards.japanese: 千九百九十九年のデビュー以降、嵐は日本国内外で人気を高めてきました。
